column1: Computation by NCES PowerStats Version 1.0 on 2/7/2020
Remedial courses: Ever taken by Disability: Sensory impairment.
The names of the variables used in this table are: DISSENSR and REMEVER.
The weight variable used in this table is WTA000.
Source: U.S. Department of Education, National Center for Education Statistics, 2007-08 National Postsecondary Student Aid Study (NPSAS:08).
Notice of Revision: In August 2013, NPSAS:08 weights were revised to match weighting procedures used in NPSAS:12.
